about_the_game:
Welcome to the captivating world of Plaquist Simulator, where you embody an apprentice drywaller on a quest for glory and independence. Build partitions, insulate ceilings, manage your stock, and create your own business to become the undisputed master of construction. Take orders, build your team, and learn new professions to diversify your services. Each project is an opportunity to showcase your expertise. So, grab your tool belt, get your screwdriver, and build your empire in the demanding world of Plaquist Simulator!

Main Features:


Step into the shoes of an apprentice drywaller and master the skills needed to create flawless partitions, insulate ceilings, and much more. Every job is an opportunity to learn and refine your techniques.




Tackle diverse challenges, from straightforward projects to more complex ventures. Master the use of tools and materials to ensure impeccable work and satisfy your clients.




Decide when to launch your own company. Hire employees, take orders, and make your business thrive. Reputation is crucial in this industry!




Take courses and explore new trades. Become a versatile expert capable of meeting all your clients' demands.




Unlock skills, upgrade your equipment, and gain reputation to climb the ranks of success in the construction world.

Plaster Simulator offers an immersive experience where every detail matters. Get ready to build, learn, and dominate the construction world like never before. Ready to build your future? Plaster Simulator awaits you!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
